testcase.classname: To validate the myntra web application
testcase.name: User shopping for the Tshirts
testcase.system-out: Given To launch the web browser.............................................passed When To open the url of myntra website......................................passed And To type and search the Tshirt product...................................passed And To select the first product and select M size...........................passed And To click Add to bag button..............................................passed And TO click the bag icon...................................................passed Then Take screenshot of the payment page....................................passed
